text: And with the two sons 46:27 Hebrew; LXX the nine sons, probably including Joseph’s grandsons through Ephraim and Manasseh; see 1 Chronicles 7:14–29. who had been born to Joseph in Egypt, the members of Jacob’s family who went to Egypt were seventy 46:27 Hebrew (see also Exodus 1:5); LXX (see also Acts 7:14) seventy-five in all.
